description: Create a probe within a monitor. Once you create a probe, and it begins monitoring your network traffic, you'll incur billing charges for that probe. This action requires the monitorName parameter. Run ListMonitors to get a list of monitor names. Note the name of the monitorName you want to create the probe for.

parameters.name: monitorName
parameters.description: The name of the monitor to associated with the probe.

parameters.name: probe
parameters.description: Describes the details of an individual probe for a monitor. The ARN of the subnet. The destination IP address. This must be either IPV4 or IPV6. destinationPort (integer) --- The port associated with the destination. This is required only if the protocol is TCP and must be a number between 1 and 65536. The protocol used for the network traffic between the source and destination. This must be either TCP or ICMP. packetSize (integer) --- The size of the packets sent between the source and destination. This must be a number between 56 and 8500. tags (dict) --- The list of key-value pairs created and assigned to the monitor. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: destination
nested_params.description: The destination IP address. This must be either IPV4 or IPV6.

nested_params.name: destinationPort
nested_params.description: The port associated with the destination. This is required only if the protocol is TCP and must be a number between 1 and 65536.

nested_params.name: protocol
nested_params.description: The protocol used for the network traffic between the source and destination. This must be either TCP or ICMP.

nested_params.name: packetSize
nested_params.description: The size of the packets sent between the source and destination. This must be a number between 56 and 8500.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: The list of key-value pairs created and assigned to the monitor.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request. Only returned if a client token was provided in the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The list of key-value pairs created and assigned to the probe. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: probeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the probe for which details are returned.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The destination IP address for the monitor. This must be either an IPv4 or IPv6 address.

nested_items.name: destinationPort
nested_items.description: The port associated with the destination. This is required only if the protocol is TCP and must be a number between 1 and 65536.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol used for the network traffic between the source and destination. This must be either TCP or ICMP.

nested_items.name: packetSize
nested_items.description: The size of the packets sent between the source and destination. This must be a number between 56 and 8500.

nested_items.name: addressFamily
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the IP address is IPV4 or IPV6.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the source VPC or subnet.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time and date that the probe was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time and date when the probe was last modified.
